Cookies Policy

The Site uses “cookies” to enhance your visits to it. A cookie is a small amount of data that is sent to your browser from a web server and stored on your computer's hard drive. We use cookies to remember you when you visit the Site, to keep track of your browsing patterns, to build up a profile of how you and other users use our the Site, to make the Site work as efficiently as possible and to administer services to you and to advertisers.

Most browsers allow you to turn off cookies. In order to do this, please look at the “help” menu on your browser. Switching off cookies may restrict your use of the Site and/or delay or affect the way in which it operates.
